channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Election Season in America: Scenes From Around the Country
item.description: The most online election in history has been snapped, shared, and memed into oblivion. WIRED’s photo department has curated moments across the country...

item.title: Meta’s former hardware lead for Orion is joining OpenAI
item.description: The former head of Meta’s augmented reality glasses efforts announced on Monday she is joining OpenAI to lead robotics and consumer hardware, accordin...

item.title: JD Vance’s Senate Office Fires Key Adviser Who Posted About Drug Use on Reddit
item.description: “Those posts were written in good humor and didn't hurt anybody,” says Aaron Kofsky, who advised Vance on crypto and banking policy, of posts in which...

item.title: Datadog challenger Dash0 aims to dash observability bill shock
item.description: The end of zero-interest rates has driven companies to look for savings wherever they can, but one area continues to be a major budget drain. Observab...

item.title: Coatue is raising $1B for AI bets
item.description: Coatue Management, a hedge fund that invested heavily in tech startups during the pandemic-infused boom, is raising $1 billion to back AI-focused comp...

item.title: Alan unveils AI health assistant for its 680k health insurance members
item.description: Alan wants to build a super app for healthcare, so it's rolling out three new product updates, including an AI chatbot that's vetted by doctors. © 202...

item.title: India issues notice to Wikipedia over concerns of bias
item.description: Wikipedia is facing mounting regulatory pressure in India as local authorities question whether the platform should continue to enjoy legal protection...

item.title: TikTok Employees Shrug as the US Election Looms
item.description: Donald Trump says he’ll spare TikTok. Kamala Harris will likely support the ban. But inside the company, few are talking about the US election.

item.title: An Oath Keeper Talks Civil War Over Pastrami on Rye
item.description: “I'm training people to survive a civil war, to get out of the way, to stay home, stay off the grid,” says Oath Keeper Jim Arroyo, in an interview two...

item.title: 16 Best Cozy Games (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Forget stressful leaderboards and time-sensitive missions. These games let you play at your own pace.
